April 1, 1984 D Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA Spring Contest huddersfield-district-bba-spring-contest-3671
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £40, 3rd £30. 4 bands competed.
Aug. 21, 2014, 2:50 p.m. June 27, 2016, 12:59 p.m.
1 Drighlington Band Colin Hardy Tintagel
2 Horbury Victoria Band Tom Greatorex Henry the Fifth [Vaughan Williams]
3 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Sinfonietta [Horovitz]
4 Lees & Glodwick Jim Hunter Suite Gothique
Withdrawn Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Bryan Garside
